modules.sql: WITH daily_agg AS (SELECT as_of, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, ROUND(SUM(amount), 2) AS total_amount, ROUND(AVG(amount), 2) AS avg_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY as_of) SELECT as_of, total_transactions, total_amount, avg_amount FROM daily_agg ORDER BY as_of
